data.comment: The big names in today's match at Erve Asito have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Pol van Boekel, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 40, An attacking Alkmaar player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Teun Koopmeiners smashes in a penalty at Erve Asito. The score is now 0-1.
Goal! Myron Boadu extends Alkmaar's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 44, Great play from Teun Koopmeiners to set up the goal.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Frank Wormuth is making the team's first substitution at Erve Asito with Lucas Schoofs replacing Tim Breukers.
Delano Burgzorg is replacing Kasper Lunding for the home team.
The away team has substituted Jonas Svensson with Yukinari Sugawara. Arne Slot is thus making his first change.
In the minute 66, Dani De Wit (Alkmaar) gets a yellow card.
Arne Slot (Alkmaar) is making a second substitution, with Zakaria Aboukhlal replacing Jesper Karlsson.
Sinan Bakis for Almelo has been booked by Pol van Boekel and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 74, Almelo make their third substitution with Jeremy Cijntje replacing Orestis Kiomourtzoglou.
Marco Rente is replacing Robin Propper for Almelo at Erve Asito.
Lucas Schoofs keeps the home team in the match by reducing the deficit to 1-2.
In the minute 76, Teun Bijleveld instrumental with a fine assist.
Giacomo Quagliata is booked for the home team.
The away team have replaced Myron Boadu with Albert Gudmundsson. This is the third substitution made today by Arne Slot.
Full-time! The final score is 1-2.
